name: 30W Rechargeable Work Light, 3000 Lumen Magnetic Work Light Battery Powered, Waterproof Portable Cordless Job Site Lighting for Construction Site, Workshop, Garage, Camping, and Car Repairing
short_description: TRESDA rechargeable LED work light has two adjustable side lights, can be flexible 180° folded backward, the main light supports 180° vertical and 360° horizontal rotation, providing omnidirectional lighting for your workplace, meet your any desired multi-directional lighting requirements.

The portable work light has 3 lights, with 20W main light and 10W SMD side lights, any light can work independently. Can output high brightness from 700Lumens to 3000Lumens through the control button, freely change the 5 light modes: High main light/Medium main light/One side-light/Two side-lights/Full Lights, and easy to Power-Off by our unique automatic rest function.

This battery work light built in 4400mAh rechargeable Lithium batteries, continue working from 3hrs to 9hours based on different light modes. It is also able to be used to charge your mobile or other devices in an emergency. And you can check the power status by the power indicator, providing all possible convenience to you.

Our LED work light has 4 strong magnets and screw hole at base, IP65 waterproof design, comfortable handle and lightweight carry, can be widely used for construction site, workshop, garage, car repairing, jetty, attic, lathe, woodturning, sandblast cabinet, home or bathroom remodel.

Our Led work light rechargeable has high quality and long lifespan, we provide 12-months warranty, and equipped with Adapter and USB cord. If you have any questions, please contact us, we provide 7x24 hrs quick response.
